params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The project in which to create the group. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]

params.name: data.group
params.description: Required. A group definition. It is an error to define the name field because the system assigns the name.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: If true, validate this request but do not create the group.
